caption.p: Summary of influenza virus infection and UPR pathway.

tr.td: Studied ER stress and UPR in IAV infection in the lung epithelial cells
IAV infection activates IRE1 pathway with subsequent XBP-1 splicing
Involved in BiP mRNA expression and XBP-1 mRNA processing
Studied UPR in murine primary tracheal epithelial cells
IAV infection induced ER-stress via ATF6 and ERp57, but not CHOP, through caspase-12
P58 IPK role in IAV infection
-May act synergistically with the UPR-mediated transcriptional activation to help IV relief from both PKR- and PERK-mediated translational repression
-Regulates eIF2a, and then regulates IV infection independent of PERK
Innate immune induction by HA through ERAD by the critical role of class I α-mannosidases (EDEM1, EDEM2, and ERManI) in initiating HA degradation
